name: Panacea
description: If you rule Time III, gain $4. If you rule Time II, draw a card. If you rule Time I, advance one of your ♛.

name: Assassin's Dagger
description: Advance one of your ♛. Then gain $4 per Time you rule.

name: Bank
description: The first time you gain $ each turn, gain an extra $1.

name: Detective
description: When you have no cards in hand and draw, draw an extra card.

name: Golden Apple
description: Each other player moves here (they don't visit this Zone, they just move).

name: Revolutionaries
description: When you play another card, advance one of your ♛ from Time II (after resolving the played card).

name: Maneuver
description: After resolving this Zone, you may move to any real Zone (without visiting it).

name: Pilgrims
description: Score a card paying $12 less, advancing 2 ♛ less.

name: Visionary
description: Advance one of your ♛. Play another card.
score-instruction: When you score this, you may score another card.

name: Meet Younger Self
score-instruction: When you score this, draw a card.

name: Secret Mission
description: Draw a card. Advance one of your ♛.
secret: At the start of your turn, you may discard this, to move to a real Time.

name: Secret Stash
description: If you're alone, gain $1 per ♛ you have here.
secret: At the start of your turn, you may discard this, to gain $4.

name: Hideout
description: At the end of your turn, if you have at least $40, advance one of your ♛.

name: University
description: After you visit a Time II Zone, draw a card, then discard a card.

name: Sunboat of Ra
description: At the end of your turn, if the last turn was another player's, you may discard this to take another turn after this one.
